user_data.target_needs: I wanted to fulfill my need for comfortable clothing that aligns with my values and also to find a suitable gift that would be appreciated by a family member.
purchase_reason: I was looking for a comfortable and versatile piece of clothing that I could wear casually. The soft and plush material, along with the zip-front design, appealed to my need for both comfort and practicality. The eco-friendly aspect of the product also resonated with my values, making me feel good about my purchase.

I wanted to buy a gift that would be appreciated and used frequently. The positive feedback from my grandpa about the comfort and quality of the sweatshirt influenced my decision. I considered the practicality of the pullover style and its versatility in pairing with different outfits.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer comfortable, lightweight, and versatile clothing that is easy to wear and maintain. I value products that are made from soft fabrics, such as cotton blends, and those that offer a good fit with adjustable features like elastic waistbands and drawstrings. I appreciate items that can be worn for various occasions, whether for lounging, exercising, or casual outings. Additionally, I tend to favor products that are well-constructed and durable, as indicated by my positive experiences with items that have sturdy stitching and quality materials. On the other hand, I dislike products that are uncomfortable, poorly fitting, or lack quality, as seen in my negative experiences with certain items that did not meet my expectations for comfort and fit.
